org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core

Interface Simulation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CloudSim

    public interface Simulation
    An interface to be implemented by a class that manages simulation execution, controlling all the simulation lifecycle.
    Author:
    Manoel Campos da Silva Filho
    See Also:
    CloudSim

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Simulation NULL 
      static PredicateAny SIM_ANY
      A standard predicate that matches any event.
      static PredicateNone SIM_NONE
      A standard predicate that does not match any events.

      • addEntity

        void addEntity(CloudSimEntity e)
        Adds a new entity to the simulation. Each CloudSimEntity object register itself when it is instantiated.
        Parameters:
        e - The new entity

        SimEvent cancel(int src,
                Predicate p)
        Removes an event from the event queue.
        Parameters:
        src - Id of entity who scheduled the event.
        p - the p
        Returns:
        the sim event

      • cancelAll

        boolean cancelAll(int src,
                  Predicate p)
        Removes all events that match a given predicate from the future event queue returns true if at least one event has been cancelled; false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        src - Id of entity who scheduled the event.
        p - the p
        Returns:
        true, if successful

        Get the current simulation time.
        Returns:
        the simulation time

        Parameters:

      • finishSimulation

        void finishSimulation()
        Internal method that allows the entities to terminate. This method should not be used in user simulations.

        Calendar getCalendar()
        Gets a new copy of initial simulation Calendar.
        Returns:
        a new copy of Calendar object
        Precondition:
        $none
        Postcondition:

      • getCloudInfoServiceEntityId

        int getCloudInfoServiceEntityId()
        Gets the entity ID of CloudInformationService.
        Returns:
        the Entity ID or if it is not found
        Precondition:
        $none
        Postcondition:
        $result >= -1

      • getDatacenterIdsList

        List<Integer> getDatacenterIdsList()
        Sends a request to Cloud Information Service (CIS) entity to get the list of all Cloud Datacenter IDs.
        Returns:
        a List containing Datacenter IDs
        Precondition:
        $none
        Postcondition:
        $none

        SimEntity getEntity(int id)
        Get the entity with a given id.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Precondition:

        Postcondition:
        $none

      • getMinTimeBetweenEvents

        double getMinTimeBetweenEvents()
        Returns the minimum time between events. Events within shorter periods after the last event are discarded.
        Returns:
        the minimum time between events.

      • getNumEntities

        int getNumEntities()
        Get the current number of entities in the simulation.
        Returns:
        The number of entities

        EventListener<SimEvent> getOnEventProcessingListener()
        Gets the EventListener object that will be notified when any event is processed by CloudSim.
        Returns:
        the EventListener.
        See Also:
        #processEvent(SimEvent)

      • hold

        void hold(int src,
          long delay)
        Used to hold an entity for some time.
        Parameters:
        src - Id of entity who scheduled the event
        delay - How many seconds after the current time the entity has to be held

      • isPaused

        boolean isPaused()
        Checks if is paused.
        Returns:
        true, if is paused

      • pause

        void pause(int src,
           double delay)
        Used to pause an entity for some time.
        Parameters:
        src - Id of entity who scheduled the event
        delay - the time period for which the entity will be inactive

      • pause

        boolean pause()
        This method is called if one wants to pause the simulation.
        Returns:
        true, if successful otherwise.

      • pause

        boolean pause(long time)
        This method is called if one wants to pause the simulation at a given time.
        Parameters:
        time - the time at which the simulation has to be paused
        Returns:
        true, if successful otherwise.

      • resume

        boolean resume()
        This method is called if one wants to resume the simulation that has previously been paused.
        Returns:
        if the simulation has been restarted or or otherwise.

      • runStart

        void runStart()
        Internal method used to start the simulation. This method should not be used by user simulations.

      • runStop

        void runStop()
        Internal method used to stop the simulation. This method should not be used directly.

      • running

        boolean running()
        Check if the simulation is still running. This method should be used by entities to check if they should continue executing.
        Returns:
        if the simulation is still running, otherwise

      • select

        SimEvent select(int src,
                Predicate p)
        Selects an event matching a predicate.
        Parameters:
        src - Id of entity who scheduled the event.
        p - the p
        Returns:
        the sim event

      • send

        void send(int src,
          int dest,
          double delay,
          int tag,
          Object data)
        Sends an event from one entity to another.
        Parameters:
        src - Id of entity who scheduled the event.
        dest - Id of entity that the event will be sent to
        delay - How many seconds after the current simulation time the event should be sent
        tag - the tag
        data - the data

      • sendFirst

        void sendFirst(int src,
               int dest,
               double delay,
               int tag,
               Object data)
        Used to send an event from one entity to another, with priority in the queue.
        Parameters:
        src - Id of entity who scheduled the event.
        dest - Id of entity that the event will be sent to
        delay - How many seconds after the current simulation time the event should be sent
        tag - the tag
        data - the data

      • sendNow

        void sendNow(int src,
             int dest,
             int tag,
             Object data)
        Sends an event from one entity to another without delaying the message.
        Parameters:
        src - Id of entity who scheduled the event.
        dest - Id of entity that the event will be sent to
        tag - the tag
        data - the data

      • setOnEventProcessingListener

        Simulation setOnEventProcessingListener(EventListener<SimEvent> onEventProcessingListener)
        Sets the EventListener object that will be notified when any event is processed by CloudSim.
        Parameters:
        onEventProcessingListener - the event listener to be set
        See Also:
        getOnEventProcessingListener()

      • start

        double start()
      throws RuntimeException
        Starts the execution of CloudSim simulation. It waits for complete execution of all entities, i.e. until all entities threads reach non-RUNNABLE state or there are no more events in the future event queue.

        Note: This method should be called after all the entities have been setup and added.

        Returns:
        the last clock time
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - when creating this entity before initialising CloudSim package or this entity name is null or empty.
        Precondition:
        $none
        Postcondition:
        $none

      • stop

        void stop()
   throws RuntimeException
        Stops Cloud Simulation (based on runStop()). This should be only called if any of the user defined entities explicitly want to terminate simulation during execution.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - This happens when creating this entity before initialising CloudSim package or this entity name is null or empty
        See Also:
        #CloudSim(int, Calendar, boolean), runStop()
        Precondition:
        $none
        Postcondition:
        $none

      • terminate

        boolean terminate()
        This method is called if one wants to terminate the simulation.
        Returns:
        true, if successful; false otherwise.

      • terminateAt

        boolean terminateAt(double time)
        This method is called if one wants to terminate the simulation at a given time.
        Parameters:
        time - the time at which the simulation has to be terminated
        Returns:
        true, if successful otherwise.

      • wait

        void wait(int src,
          Predicate p)
        Sets an entity's state to be waiting. The predicate used to wait for an event is now passed to Sim_system. Only events that satisfy the predicate will be passed to the entity. This is done to avoid unnecessary context switches.
        Parameters:
        src - Id of entity who scheduled the event.
        p - the p

      • updateEntityName

        boolean updateEntityName(String oldName)
        Removes an entity with and old name from the #entitiesByName map and adds it again using its new name.
        Parameters:
        oldName - the name the entity had before
        Returns:
        true if the entity was found and changed into the list, false otherwise

      • waiting

        int waiting(int d,
            Predicate p)
        Checks if events for a specific entity are present in the deferred event queue.
        Parameters:
        d - the d
        p - the p
        Returns:
        the int
